com.samsung.android.sdk.motion

Class SmotionPedometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.motion.SmotionPedometer

  • public class SmotionPedometer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the functionality for getting pedometer information. When users move, the pedometer collects the step count, speed, distance, calorie consumption, and step status information. The values for speed, distance, and calorie consumption can be inaccurate, because the user can only define their user profile (gender, height, and weight) in the SHealth application on the device. If no user profile exists, the calculations can be inaccurate. If the device does not have a pressure sensor, the up/down step count cannot be calculated and the up/down status cannot be recognized.

    This is the example of SmotionPedometer.

     import com.samsung.android.sdk.SsdkUnsupportedException;
 import com.samsung.android.sdk.motion.Smotion;
 import com.samsung.android.sdk.motion.SmotionPedometer;
 import com.samsung.android.sdk.motion.SmotionPedometer.ChangeListener;
 import com.samsung.android.sdk.motion.SmotionPedometer.Info;
 
 import android.app.Activity;
 import android.os.Bundle;
 import android.os.Looper;
 
 public class MainActivity extends Activity {
 
     private Smotion mSmotion;
 
     private SmotionPedometer mSmotionPedometer;
 
     @Override
     protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
         super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
         setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);
         mSmotion = new Smotion();
 
         try {
             mSmotion.initialize(getApplicationContext());
         } catch (SsdkUnsupportedException e) {
             // TODO Auto-generated catch block
             e.printStackTrace();
         }
 
         if (mSmotion.isFeatureEnabled(Smotion.TYPE_PEDOMETER)) {
             mSmotionPedometer = new SmotionPedometer(Looper.getMainLooper(), mSmotion);
 
         }
     }
 
     @Override
     protected void onResume() {
         // TODO Auto-generated method stub
         super.onResume();
         mSmotionPedometer.start(mChangeListener);
     }
 
     @Override
     protected void onDestroy() {
         // TODO Auto-generated method stub
         super.onDestroy();
         mSmotionPedometer.stop();
     }
 
     private ChangeListener mChangeListener = new ChangeListener() {
 
         @Override
         public void onChanged(Info info) {
             // TODO Auto-generated method stub
             long timestamp = info.getTimeStamp();
             int status = info.getStatus();
             long stepCount = info.getCount(SmotionPedometer.Info.COUNT_TOTAL);
             double distance = info.getDistance();
             double speed = info.getSpeed();
             double calorie = info.getCalorie();
         }
 
     };
 
 }
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SmotionPedometer.ChangeListener
      This listener interface receives pedometer events.
      static class  SmotionPedometer.Info
      This class contains the pedometer event information and provides methods to access it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmotionPedometer

        public SmotionPedometer(android.os.Looper looper,
                Smotion motion)
        Creates a SmotionPedometer instance with the specified looper and Smotion instances.
        Parameters:
        looper - The looper of the main thread in your application.
        motion - The Smotion instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if the looper or Smotion object passed is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the Context passed is null. This can happen if you did not initialize the Motion package before creating the SmotionPedometer instance.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if the device does not support SmotionPedometer.
        Since:
        1.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(SmotionPedometer.ChangeListener listener)
        Add the specified ChangeListener instance.
        Parameters:
        listener - The ChangeListener instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if a listener is already registered or the device does not support SmotionPedometer.

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the listener passed is null.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Remove the ChangeListener instance.

        You must call stop() before the process(application) finishes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown when stop() is called before calling the start() method.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getInfo

        public SmotionPedometer.Info getInfo()
        Get the pedometer information such as step count, calorie consumption, distance, speed, and status.

        The values for the step count, calorie consumption and distance are cumulative since the last reboot when at least one listener is added.

        If the info provided by SmotionPedometer is not valid, this method returns null.
        Returns:
        The Pedometer information object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown when getInfo() is called before calling the start() method.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • updateInfo

        public void updateInfo()
        Update the pedometer information when the screen is off.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown when updateInfo() is called before calling the start() method.
        Since:
        1.0.0
